short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out if a book on Amazon is also available at Powell’s Books in Portland, Oregon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically find out if a book on Amazon is also available at Powell’s, Portland’s legendary independent bookstore. Order online with Powell’s and have it shipped to your door. Small and independent businesses need our help more than ever.

Powell’s Compare works while you browse books on Amazon. While looking at hardcovers or paperbacks, Powell’s Compare checks the Powell’s website. Get notified right away when there’s a match, go to Powell’s website to complete your purchase.

Powell’s Compare is a product of Matter Supply Co, a digital agency in Portland, Oregon. Powell’s Compare is not affiliated with Powell’s Books, Inc. We built this to help a local business and piece of Portland we love.
